User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user of the ValuScan platform.

createdAt.description: Timestamp of when the user account was created.

subscriptionStatus.description: The current status of the user's subscription (if applicable).

stripeCustomerId.description: The user's Stripe customer ID for billing.

Item.title: Item
Item.description: Represents an item listed on the ValuScan marketplace.

userId.description: Reference to the User who listed this item.

price.description: The user-defined price of the item.

aiEstimatedValue.description: The market value of the item as estimated by AI.

imageUrl.description: URL of the image for the item.

createdAt.description: Timestamp of when the item was listed.

status.description: The current status of the item in the marketplace.

Sale.title: Sale
Sale.description: Represents a sale of an item on the ValuScan marketplace.

itemId.description: Reference to the Item that was sold.

buyerId.description: Reference to the User who purchased the item.

sellerId.description: Reference to the User who sold the item.

salePrice.description: Price at which the item was sold.

ethicalContributionId.description: Reference to the associated ethical contribution for this sale.

Pickup.title: Pickup
Pickup.description: Represents a pickup request for a sold item.

id.description: Unique identifier for the pickup request.

saleId.description: Reference to the Sale for which the pickup is requested.

pickupDate.description: Date and time of the scheduled pickup.

address.description: Address where the item needs to be picked up.

status.description: Status of the pickup request (e.g., requested, scheduled, completed).

EthicalContribution.title: EthicalContribution
EthicalContribution.description: Represents an ethical funding contribution made from a sale for the LEAN Foundation.

saleId.description: Reference to the Sale from which the contribution is made.

firestore.reasoning: The Firestore structure has been updated to support the core business logic. The User entity now includes 'tier', 'subscriptionStatus', and 'stripeCustomerId' to manage user roles and billing. The Item entity has a 'status' to track its lifecycle (listed, sold, shipped) and 'aiEstimatedValue'. The Sale entity now more clearly separates seller and buyer IDs and links to an EthicalContribution, which is its own top-level collection to serve as a proper ledger for the LEAN Foundation. This denormalized, segregated structure simplifies security rules and supports efficient queries for marketplace, user-specific, and administrative functions.
